original_title: André Rieu - The Best Of Live
overview: DISC 1.Dein Ist Mein Ganzes Herz, 2.Wiener Blut, 3.Hava Nagila, 4.Tea For Two, 5.Lara's Theme, 6.Poliushko Polie, 7.Kalinka, 8.Funiculi Funicula, 9.La Vie Est Belle, 10.Salome-Sabredance, 11.An Der Schonen Blauen Donau, 12.Radetzky Marsch, 13.Bolero, 14.The Second Waltz, 15.Sirtaki (Zorba's Dance), 16.Amazing Grace, 17.Auld Lang Syne. DiSC 2: Andre Rieu - Live At The Royal Albert Hall - 1.Voices Of Spring, 2.Vienna Blood, 3.Seventh Heaven Of Love, 4.Hava Nagila, 5.Tea For Two, 6.The Skaters Waltz, 7. Funiculi Funicula, 8.Nun's Choir, 9.Salome Sabredance, 10.The Blue Danube, 11.Radetzky March, 12.Strauss & Co, 13.The Second Waltz, 14.Glenn Miller Melody, 15.The Andre Sisters, 16.Sirtaki, 17.Stars And Stripes, 18.Auld Lang Syne, 19.Brasil Symphony. Extras: My Home Town, Photogallery:Unique photos of Andre from the stage and his own personal collection, Discography: His complete musical works. These discs are in English/German.
title: André Rieu - The Best Of Live
